content: Flint Vanguard is one of the optional Yaoguai Chief boss fights Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the second of the stone bosses in Chapter 5, and another that will drop a Samadhi Fire Crystal.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
Flint Vanguard is one of the optional Yaoguai Chief boss fights Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the second of the stone bosses in Chapter 5, and another that will drop a Samadhi Fire Crystal.
